summary: Replaces Valdr\'s lucky dagger with hand made from scratch models and textures of lore friendly Animated Balisong.
descriptionHtml:
What is this Mod?

Replaces Valdr\'s lucky dagger

http://elderscrolls.wikia.com/wiki/Valdr\'s_Lucky_Dagger

with hand made from scratch models and textures of lore friendly Animated Balisong.

Once equipped the knife will open/close as it\'s made ready/sheath

The enchantment has been buffed to 35% (better then 1 in 3) and critical damage increased from 5 to 8.

If you just want to try it out you can console it in with...

Help Valdr 4

Player.additem XX 000B994E 1

in the console. 

Dptheslothking was kind enough to do a showcase video for the mod, thanks so much dude!

[youtube]2cryN-ZaIM0[/youtube]

Check out his channel here

http://www.youtube.com/user/Slothability?feature=watch



INSTALLATION

Click the Download with Manager button in the files section to download to NMM.
Activate the mod in NMM. 

To manually install, just download the file and extract the files into the data folder. Don\'t forget to activate the .esp :)


Premise:

Inspired by a mod FrankFamily did for NewVegas

http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/mods/46817/?

This is something I\'ve wanted to get out of my system for a while now, a balisong type weapon for skyrim. The animations are only basic flip open/close but anyone who follows my mods knows I come back when I get better and update/improve so expect more elaborate animations in the future

Check out the Sticky in comments for more and hope you get some fun from it :)
author: KettleWitch
